* Dinobot had seen the posture in which Tavatron had taken when he had bared his teeth and snapped towards her with a growl, and if he didn't know any better he might had realized that it may have been submission.
But when his own posture had become more relaxed and a bit more wicked in a way, that was all before he turned away and then began towards the War room to attend the meeting.
Even with his back turned her knew that Tavatron had then gained courage and then had come up from her crouch to stand at her full height, an unwise choice in case she should cause rage in him in which would then replace common sense.
He then heard her transform into her robot mode but did not look back, his normal uncaring and unfeeling mood setting in and extinguishing the humor in which he had experienced before. The rare moment now gone for a while, it even taking years to surface again at times.
Dinobot reached the War room just as Tavatron had caught up to him, her pulling ahead a bit and then opening the door for him with the comment of if he thought he was smart.
He noted her smile before her hand had opened the door but had then kept his commonly emotionless expression, not really in the mood for any more comments or unwanted concerns.
He glared at her for a moment for no real reason in particular but then walked up and pushed the door even wider then she had.
He growled...*

" I do not think, I know."

* And with that Dinobot then gestured for Tavatron to take the lead and enter the room before himself, his last comment hanging in the air but then hopefully ending the humorous moments of the day...or just for now. Either suited him fine.*
